text: tab (us vakt) zin baaton mein tum ikhtelaaf karate vah tumhen bata dega aur (ai rasool) ham phir kahate hain ki jo ehakaam khuda naazil kie hain tum usake mutaabiq phaisala karo aur unakee (beja) khvaahishe nafasiyaanee kee pairavee na karo (balki) tum unase bache raho (aisa na ho) ki kisee hukm se jo khuda ne tum par naazil kiya hai tumako ye log bhataka den phir agar ye log tumhaare hukm se munh moden to samajh lo ki (goya) khuda hee kee marazee hai ki unake baaz gunaahon kee vajah se unhen museebat mein phaisa de aur isamen to shak hee nahin ki bahutere log badachalan hain
